text: hi I'm Erin with AWS in this video we
will share with you a high-level
overview of the Amazon chime SDK and
it's applications Amazon chime SDK is a
collection of client and server-side
components that you can use to add audio
calling video calling and screen sharing
capabilities to your applications for
example you can add video in Health
application to allow doctors and
patients to connect remotely or add
audio calling on your company website so
customers can quickly connect with
companies sales or support agents other
applications include banking education
gaming and interpreter services the
Amazon chime SDK can be integrated in
applications running in the latest
version of web browsers like Google
Chrome Mozilla Firefox and chromium
based Microsoft edge on Mac OS and
Windows operating systems by leveraging
the real-time communication capabilities
provided by the Amazon chime SDK you can
focus your time and resources on
building core application features and
eliminate the costing of Plex 'ti of
creating and managing your own real-time
communication infrastructure you get to
leverage the same real-time
communication infrastructure services
that have powered meetings on Amazon
chime and online meetings and chat
service from AWS these include audio
mixing video forwarding and screen
sharing services and an integrated turn
service for traversing corporate
firewalls and Nats
you can deliver a secure and high
quality audio calling video calling and
screen sharing experience over the high
speed and reliable AWS networking
backbone you can also trigger workflows
by receiving real-time events like
starting and stopping of meeting
sessions and join and leave events on
Amazon event bridge simple queueing
service or simple notification service
the Amazon chime voice connector service
can also be used to enable phone users
to dial into their meeting sessions and
leverages audio streaming functionality
to transcribe meeting audio finally you
get all the features at a single price
per attendee per minute regardless of
audio video and screen sharing usage to
learn more about how you can build with
the Amazon chime SDK check out our demo
and code walkthrough video
and visit the Amazon chime SDK
documentation page thanks for listening
